subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[get up]] (from a place)
# {{†}} to [[get up]] (in the morning) and go to [[work]]
# {{†}} to [[begin]] to [[grow]]; to [[come into being]]
# {{†}} to [[arise]]; to [[come about]]; to [[happen]]; to [[occur]]; to [[break out]]
# to [[do]]; to [[perform]]; to [[carry out]]
#: {{zh-x|你 在 作 什麼？|What are you '''doing'''?}}
# to [[work]]; to [[exert]] oneself
# to [[make]]; to [[manufacture]]
# to [[compose]]; to [[write]]
#: {{zh-x|作者|author}}
#* {{zh-x|你 作 緊 乜嘢 呀{aa3}？|What are you '''writing'''?|C-GZ}}
# {{†}} to [[brace]] oneself; to [[boost]]
# {{†}} to [[feign]]; to [[pretend]]
# to [[work]] as; to [[serve]] as
# {{†}} to [[build]]; to [[construct]]
# {{†}} to [[play]]; to [[perform]]
# {{†}} to [[emit]]; to [[give out]]
# {{†}} to [[start]]; to [[launch]]
# {{†}} to be [[like]]; [[similar]]
# {{†}} {{zh-alt-form|詛|to [[curse]]; to [[damn]]}}
# [[work]]; [[composition]]; [[article]]
# {{†}} [[affair]]; [[matter]]
# {{†}} [[measure]]; [[action]]

{{zh-cat|Beginning}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|さく}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=さく}} {{m|zh|作|tr=tsak||to do, to work}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''zok<sup>3</sup>'', {{etyl|wuu|-}} ''tsoq'' (T4).

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|さく}}

# a [[work]], a [[production]] {{qualifier|particularly a cultural work, such as a work of art, of literature, or of theatre}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|つく|o1=り}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|作る|tr=tsukuru||to make; to build; to work the land, to grow something}}, itself from {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=つくる}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: More often spelled with the [[okurigana]], as {{m|ja|作り}}.

subSections.title: Suffix
Usage notes
subSections.text: More often spelled with the [[okurigana]], as {{m|ja|作り}}.

subSections.text:
{{head|xug|kanji}}
